title: Ecotourism: an experience with nature
creator_credit: Ben Cropp Productions, Seven Network Limited (Australia) and Ben Cropp
brief_description: What does the word “ecotourism” mean? By visiting some of Australia’s most exotic national parks, this program explains the concept. Resort owners and tour operators are attempting to provide quality experiences for tourists interested in nature without subjecting the local environment to the damage normally associated with tourism.
creator_credit_for_label: Ben Cropp Productions, Seven Network Limited (Australia) and Ben Cropp
